snippet: Netflix's chief executive, Reed Hastings, has often compared his company's Web streaming service to HBO. That comparison is inching closer to reality. Over the last several weeks, Mr. Hastings and his top lieutenants are said to have met with major...
abstract: Netflix's chief executive, Reed Hastings, has often compared his company's Web streaming service to HBO. That comparison is inching closer to reality. Over the last several weeks, Mr. Hastings and his top lieutenants are said to have met with major cable operators to discuss a way for Netflix to appear on monthly cable bills.

headline.main: Netflix Said to Be Aiming for a Cable Partnership
